title: Driver satisfaction with Uber U.S. 2017 to 2019
summary: Sadly , the trend of fatal police shootings in the united seems to only be increasing , with a total 897 civilians having been shot , 205 of whom were black , as of 24 , 2019 . In 2017 , there were 987 fatal police shootings , and in 2018 this figure increased to 996 . police brutality in the templateTitle[4] .
gold: This statistic shows the driver satisfaction with Uber in the United States from 2017 to 2019 . During the 2019 survey , 34.1 percent of the respondents agreed that they are somewhat satisfied with Uber .
